state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, head south. With that done, make an attempt to travel east. Following that, head north. Then, try to travel east. After that, recover the fudge scented passkey from the floor of the bedchamber. With the fudge scented passkey, check that the fudge scented door is unlocked with the fudge scented passkey. After that, make it so that the fudge scented door is ajar. And then, try to move south. After that, attempt to move south. Then, make an attempt to venture south. After that, go to the west. If you can accomplish that, attempt to move north. After that, venture west. Then, pick-up the passkey from the floor of the scullery. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Study =- You've just sauntered into a study. Were you looking for a stand? Because look over there, it's a stand. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the stand. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Study =-0/1
next_state: -= Studio =- You are in a studio. It seems to be pretty ordinary here. You can barely contain your excitement. You scan the room, seeing a table. You shudder, but continue examining the table. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Studio =-0/2

next_state: -= Kitchenette =- You're now in a kitchenette. The room is well lit. You can see a chest. You check the price tag glued to the chest. Seventy big ones?! That's ridiculous! You ever meet my buddy, they work for the mayor? I'm sure my friend could get you one of those for 45 bucks! Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this? You can see a freezer. Is this it? Is this what you came to TextWorld to see? a freezer? What a letdown! The freezer is empty! You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a shelf. The shelf is usual. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. There is an open fudge scented door leading north. There is an open hatch leading south. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Kitchenette =-0/9

admissible_commands: insert fudge scented passkey into chest
insert fudge scented passkey into freezer
put fudge scented passkey on shelf
